attributes.title: Worst app ever!
attributes.review: This app gave my phone a nasty virus. Now my phone is acting up. I took it to the apple store and they said my phone has chlamydia. Thanks a lot Donald trump. Now I’m taking my phone to therapy because of you! I’ll send you the bills.

attributes.title: My pain
attributes.review: I downloaded this app exsoecting content from a great person but instead found a racist homophobic fascist president 😡 and the app even gives your phone a virus and now I can’t stop getting ads to download tik tok

attributes.title: See what happened was
attributes.review: See what happened was i opened the app and it took me straight to my private safari window and opened the video and ruined the video i was saving for later and now im sad.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded it my phone started to get really slow. Even to the point where it would start to shut down on its own. My phone even had started to get random apps downloaded. So weird. So I repeat DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!

attributes.title: Instructions not clear
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and now I have a f-150 truck sitting on my front lawn. There’s a couple of empty bud light cans on the bed of the truck, with a southern pride flag across the top. There’s 5 tobacco dip cans on the dash, and a political sticker on the back windshield. Confused. Needless to say, this app is garbáge.

attributes.title: The answer is no
attributes.review: This app makes no scene. It literally shouldn't even exist.  I got the app and after having I started to realize that we have a an orange racist misogynistic homophobic taxed evading lie telling conceited 76 year old white man for a president. Do better y’all.

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: I got this app to learn more about our current POTUS Donald J Trump, but the app is full of fake news and propaganda. I couldn’t find any thing truthful on the entire app. It also crashed my phone. Wouldn’t wish this app on my worst enemy.

attributes.title: Badddd app
attributes.review: I met trump one day and he told me to move along bc I was in a wheel chair and when all I wanted was an autograph he pushed me and I fell into a puddle and my wheel chair broke so now I can’t afford one I was a big fan of u Donald but now I’m just disappointed😭😭

attributes.title: Bad App
attributes.review: This app is terrible I came here to buy my BTS MERCH but instead it said Trump 2020👹idk what type of prank this is but someone needs to get rid of it I was scammed...SCAMMED I TELL YOU😭 Also a picture of Donald Trump appear I I hat a heart attack man this guy looked like some demon out to get me. DO NOT GET THIS APP...ty have a nice day✨🧚🏾‍♀️🌈💐

attributes.title: Horrible really a 0/5
attributes.review: I had a strange orange man show up when I opened the app. It triggered my horrible ptsd and made me have a panic attack. I still am fearing for my life even while this review. It so bad it makes homestuck look like the gospel.
